title: coreprotect报错
txt_content:
16.08 09:03:03 [Server] WARN at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745) 16.08 09:03:03 [Server] WARN at net.coreprotect.consumer.Consumer.run(Consumer.java:49) 16.08 09:03:03 [Server] WARN at net.coreprotect.consumer.Process.processConsumer(Process.java:48) 16.08 09:03:03 [Server] WARN at net.coreprotect.database.Database.prepareStatement(Database.java:208) 16.08 09:03:03 [Server] WARN at net.coreprotect.database.Database.prepareStatement(Database.java:183) 16.08 09:03:03 [Server] WARN at org.sqlite.Conn.prepareStatement(Conn.java:383) 16.08 09:03:03 [Server] WARN at org.sqlite.Conn.prepareStatement(Conn.java:399) 16.08 09:03:03 [Server] WARN at org.sqlite.Conn.prepareStatement(Conn.java:404) 16.08 09:03:03 [Server] WARN at org.sqlite.PrepStmt.<init>(PrepStmt.java:42) 16.08 09:03:03 [Server] WARN at org.sqlite.DB.prepare(DB.java:123) 16.08 09:03:03 [Server] WARN at org.sqlite.NativeDB.prepare(Native Method) 16.08 09:03:03 [Server] WARN at org.sqlite.DB.throwex(DB.java:374) 16.08 09:03:03 [Server] WARN at org.sqlite.DB.newSQLException(DB.java:387) 16.08 09:03:03 [Server] WARN at org.sqlite.DB.newSQLException(DB.java:383) 16.08 09:03:03 [Server] WARN java.sql.SQLException: [SQLITE_ERROR] SQL error or missing database (no such table: co_block)

后台总是开服一会就报，而且控制台里的正常信息也看不到了，在游戏里输入/co 指令都没反应，输了/co reload 显示没有记录，插件和配置文件重装过很多次了，也去官网下过，都没用，到底改怎么解决，或者推荐另一个查询插件

replies.author: 酷车手BB弹
replies.txt_content:
楼主是什么服务端
可以先试试将插件的文件夹删掉后让他重新生成试试

酷车手BB弹 发表于 2016-8-16 13:41
楼主是什么服务端
可以先试试将插件的文件夹删掉后让他重新生成试试
cauldron 是plugins文件吗
